title: ICE: autoderef failed

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Hello,
I have a weird compiler error when using Arc to store boxed closures:

``` rust
use std::sync::Arc;
fn test() {
    let command = Arc::new(Box::new(|&:| {}));
    command();
}
```

It gives the following error:

However, the following code works:

``` rust
use std::sync::Arc;
use std::ops::Deref;
fn test() {
    let command = Arc::new(Box::new(|&:| {}));
    let intermediate = command.deref();
    intermediate();
}
```
